titleStmt.title: Urbs deplorata. A sermon preached in course in the cathedral church of St. Mary Lincoln on the tenth Sunday after Trinity, Aug. 19. 1666. Happening at the time of the general assize. By Edward Boteler, prebendary of that church, rector of Wintringham in that county, and one of his Majesties chaplains.
titleStmt.author: Boteler, Edward, d. 1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.C. for Octavian Pulleyn, at the Kings head in Little-Britain,

notesStmt.note: With coat of arms on verso of first leaf.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
